hero.title: Get Reliable Information About Your Vehicle
hero.description: Detailed vehicle reliability data, common issues, and expert analysis.

reliabilityScores.title: Reliability Scores
reliabilityScores.description: Get comprehensive reliability scores for engines, transmissions, electrical systems, and more.

commonIssues.title: Common Issues
commonIssues.description: Learn about common problems, estimated repair costs, and when they typically occur.

expertAnalysis.title: Expert Analysis
expertAnalysis.description: Access detailed AI-powered analysis of each vehicle's reliability compared to similar models.

premiumData.title: Premium Data
premiumData.description: Subscribe for in-depth reports, recall information, and detailed reliability insights.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.description: Access the vehicle reliability data you need with our flexible subscription plans

steps.title: Enter Vehicle Details
steps.description: Provide the year, make, model, and mileage of the vehicle you want to research.

steps.title: Get Instant Results
steps.description: Our AI analyzes data from multiple sources to provide accurate reliability information.

steps.title: Make Informed Decisions
steps.description: Use the reliability data to make better decisions about buying, selling, or maintaining vehicles.

success.title: Payment Successful!

cancel.title: Payment Cancelled
